name: GTM Code Visibility
author: Off-Site Services, Inc.

sections.description:
Allows admins to add Google Tag Manager code to your site and use it only when site is switched to “Search Engine Visibility”.

Use Settings->Reading: check/uncheck “Search Engine Visibility” and add code to “GTM code fields”.
sections.installation:
1. Upload entire /gtm-code-visible folder to /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate plugin through Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. Add code Google Tag Manager in Settings>Reading “GTM code fields”

short_description: Easily add Google Tag Manager code to your site and use it only when site is switched to "Search Engine Visibility".
description:
Allows admins to add Google Tag Manager code to your site and use it only when site is switched to “Search Engine Visibility”.

Use Settings->Reading: check/uncheck “Search Engine Visibility” and add code to “GTM code fields”.

screenshots.caption: Simply paste Google Tag Manager code into GTM code fields
